case.state: I am Princess Zelda. It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
I am Princess Zelda. It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
May I have ~cards~ cards?
I suppose I will take ~cards~ cards.
Pray thee, ~cards~ cards?
Could the dealer spare ~cards~ cards?
May I compliment you on your excellent taste in undergarments, Hermione?
What splendid cards!
I'm not removing any clothing just yet.
This could not get much better.
This hand should guarantee my safety.
Oh, thank the heavens! I should be safe for now.
With a hand like this, I cannot lose this round!
The odds are in my favor!
I'm surely protected with these cards.
The gods have answered my prayers!
What a blessing!
These card will surely protect me! What a relief!
I'll be staying clothed for the time being it seems!
These cards should prevent me from exposing any more of myself this round!
It will take quite a lot of misfortune for me to lose this round!
You all will have to wait to see more of me!
Amazing! Just when I needed it, the gods have blessed my hand!
This might work in my favor.
I have certainly seen better.
I suppose I cannot complain.
A fair hand to have.
I pray these cards are enough to keep my dress on...
Well, I will have to make do with these.
I could win with this, if the gods are in my favor.
These could be worse, I suppose...
All I can do is wait to see if these are enough...
Well, I guess these will do.
Not the best, not the worst.
Will this be enough? I surely hope so.
My fate is in the balance now.
Please, please be enough...
I wish I could have a more confident hand.
Oh dear. I hope this is enough to get by.
This appears to be the ultimate test of faith.
My luck appears to have run out.
My wisdom tells me to prepare for the worst...
Oh dear. How unfortunate.
Quite the spot of bad luck.
I guess fate was not on my side this round...
My prayers were not answered...
On the bright side, I still have some clothing to spare if I lose.
I will be most uncomfortable if I lose again...
I'm not so sure about this...
Impossible! Ganon must have cursed these cards!
If only I could go back in time and get a better hand...
You will be seeing more of me shortly, I presume...
How... Regrettable...
It is not possible for cards to be this bad!
I'm surely going to have to strip with these cards...
I suppose there is nothing I can do now...
It appears you all will get a show shortly...
I am most certainly done for...
If Zant could get me out of this situation, Twilight would veil Hyrule once more...
Well, if everyone else is naked, I guess it's only fair that I be as well...
Removing an item for you all is the least I could do when I have such a lead.
I'm willing to remove another item after such a winning streak.
I hope you all don't consider this to be an unfair tactic.
It seems obvious that it had to happen sometime.
To be honest, I was hoping that I wouldn't lose any more hands.
It appears that my luck has finally run out...
I'm quite surprised I managed to keep my leggings this long.
I was hoping I would have won by now...
Well, if everyone else is getting naked, I guess it's only fair that I be as well...
Fair is fair. I shall remove an item just as everyone else will.
Oh well. I suppose I still have some small items to lose.
I'm not in a bad spot just yet. I still have a few items to go before I must remove more important items.
I suppose I will feel better with all my jewelry off, anyway.
I suppose there is still a chance that this will be the last I lose.
I cannot stall any longer. I must remove my dress now...
It was foolish to think I would keep these for much longer.
Now you all get to see what I have been hiding...
It was only a matter of time before I had to bare it all...
Oh dear. I lost already? I hope this doesn't speak for how the rest of the game will go.
Is it my turn already? This is not a good start.
My turn again so soon? Goodness...
I do hope this bad luck does not subsist...
I lost again? The gods are not on my side right now.
I truly did not think I would have to remove my dress this quickly...
I have never had such terrible luck in all of my life...
Well, I suppose if I must...
I fear that some foul play may have been involved to put me in this predicament...
I suppose I shall start with my boots.
My tiara is merely a symbol of status. I am not ashamed to remove it.
It takes me quite a while to do my hair like this.
Seeing me without my gloves is nearly as much of a rare sight as seeing me without my dress.
I was hoping it wouldn't come to this, but I did agree to do this when I decided to play...
I suppose losing my leggings is not too terrible.
Off it goes...
I'll just slip these off, then...
Can you conjure some clothes for me, Hermione? Is it against the rules?
Please don't tell this to anyone in Hyrule. This could damage my reputation.
This is not one of the possibilities I anticipated.
The first step of many to come, I'm sure.
We are only scratching the surface now.
Admittedly, it feels nice to get all of this jewelry off of me.
I don't have much left to lose now...
It's rare that I am ever this unclothed, so enjoy the sight while you can.
Running out of items is a growing concern, however...
I am a grown woman. I have no reason to be ashamed of my body.
I have never been nude around others before, so you all had best be grateful for this sight.
Please keep this a secret from everyone...
Link! It is delightful that we both got invited to this gathering.
Please, ~name~, show us how it is done.
It had to be someone, ~name~.
I'm terribly sorry about this.

I cannot believe I am really going to witness this.
I sincerely hope I do not lose too...
That will be me if I don't play my cards right...
Finally, the sacred doors are unsealed!
I suppose you'll be aiming for a better performance than mine.
Such a touching story. Please tell us more, Nagisa.

Is this your usual technique, ~name~?...
Surely having all eyes on you would make this task more difficult?...
Oh, what an interesting technique...
That's all there is to it, then?...
Oh dear!
Goodness! That was quite extreme!
That must have felt intense!
You made a puddle! I didn't even know that was possible!
I... I guess you're finished.
Oh dear... I was not expecting to be the first to lose...
I was hoping I would not have to do this, but I cannot argue the rules...
I have never done this before...
I'm not too good at this, yet...
It's alright if you watch, Link. This was destined to happen.
Pleasuring myself while surrounded by men is such an exhilarating experience.
I have never, ah~, felt such pleasure before...
This audience is making this... Exhilarating...
Mhm, this feels so good...
This is simply d-divine...
I should have done this sooner...
I- I'm going numb with pleasure...
I f-feel like I'm melting...
Ahh wow... *huff* This feels... *puff* Incredible!
My head is spinning! It feels so miraculous!
I think I'm getting so close, a-aaah~!
Ah~! Yes! I'm losing control of myself!
Oh wow! This is divine!
Ah! This is it! I cannot stop myself!
Oh~ goodness! Such pleasure~!
I'm light headed after such an intense finish...
I should do that more often...
Do we have any towels available?...
This card game is a delight...
I apologize for the mess that I made.
This competition was much easier than I had hoped.
Not quite a perfect performance, but it is a victory nonetheless.
A victory! One which didn't require me to remove my dress, at that!
Although I came close to revealing my undergarments, this was a fun match.
This might not be the most dignified way to win, but it is still a victory nonetheless.
I am victorious. May I have my dress back now?
I enjoyed this activity. It felt nice to be undressed for once.
This experience was quite fun. I should be more comfortable with the idea of being naked in the future.

You have defeated a formidable princess. I congratulate you.
The gods have blessed you with this victory.
